JavaFX 14
 

Uses of Class
javafx.scene.input.Dragboard

Packages that use Dragboard 
Package Description
javafx.scene
Provides the core set of base classes for the JavaFX Scene Graph API.
javafx.scene.input
Provides the set of classes for mouse and keyboard input event handling.

  • Uses of Dragboard in javafx.scene

    Methods in javafx.scene that return Dragboard 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Dragboard Node.startDragAndDrop​(TransferMode... transferModes)
    Confirms a potential drag and drop gesture that is recognized over this Node.
    Dragboard Scene.startDragAndDrop​(TransferMode... transferModes)
    Confirms a potential drag and drop gesture that is recognized over this Scene.

  • Uses of Dragboard in javafx.scene.input

    Methods in javafx.scene.input that return Dragboard 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Dragboard DragEvent.getDragboard()
    A dragboard that is available to transfer data.
    Constructors in javafx.scene.input with parameters of type Dragboard 
    Constructor Description
    DragEvent​(Object source, EventTarget target, EventType<DragEvent> eventType, Dragboard dragboard, double x, double y, double screenX, double screenY, TransferMode transferMode, Object gestureSource, Object gestureTarget, PickResult pickResult)
    Constructs new DragEvent event.
    DragEvent​(EventType<DragEvent> eventType, Dragboard dragboard, double x, double y, double screenX, double screenY, TransferMode transferMode, Object gestureSource, Object gestureTarget, PickResult pickResult)
    Constructs new DragEvent event with empty source and target.
